name: Expulsim
description:
A Prototype Handball VR game using Leap Motion and Oculus Rift.

This game requires a Leap Motion to play at minimum.

The user may also use the Oculus Rift, however we strongly recommend the user have a way to attach the Leap Motion to the front of the Oculus to properly experience the game. We recommend adhesive Velcro or tape.

At the start of the game there will be a checkbox, this regulates the user's Oculus functions. If the user does not have/want to play with the Oculus, please uncheck the box with the mouse cursor.
